key.name: theme
key.summary: DockbarX theme
key.description: DockbarX theme

key.name: popup-style-file
key.summary: The name of the file that contains the Window list style
key.description: The name of the file that contains the Window list style

key.name: groupbutton-attention-notification-type
key.summary: Attention notification type
key.description: Attention notification type

key.name: workspace-behavior
key.summary: Workspace behavior
key.description: Workspace behavior

key.name: popup-delay
key.summary: Window list delay
key.description: Window list delay in micro seconds.

key.name: second-popup-delay
key.summary: Delay when swithich window lists
key.description: The delay in closing one window list and opening another.

key.name: popup-align
key.summary: The alignment of the window list in relation to the button.
key.description: The alignment of the window list in relation to the button. (Left, right or center)

key.name: no-popup-for-one-window
key.summary: Don't show the window list when a program has only one window.
key.description: Don't show the window list when a program has only one window.

key.name: show-only-current-desktop
key.summary: Show only applications and windows that exists on the current desktop/workspace.
key.description: Show only applications and windows that exists on the current desktop/workspace.

key.name: show-only-current-monitor
key.summary: Show only applications and windows that exists on the monitor where DockbarX resides.
key.description: Show only applications and windows that exists on the monitor where DockbarX resides.

key.name: preview
key.summary: Use thumbnails in window list
key.description: Use thumbnails in window list. This option only works when you use the window manager kwin or compiz with adyfuoadyfudfas

key.name: preview-size
key.summary: The size of the thumbnail in pixels
key.description: The size of the thumbnail in pixels

key.name: preview-keep
key.summary: Keep previews for minimized windows
key.description: Keep previews for minimized windows

key.name: old-menu
key.summary: Use the old gtk style menu
key.description: Use the old gtk style menu for the right-click menu.

key.name: show-close-button
key.summary: Show close buttons in the window list
key.description: Show close buttons in the window list.

key.name: locked-list-in-menu
key.summary: Show the option to use the locked list
key.description: The locked list is a list for a program that is always visible on the screen.

key.name: locked-list-no-overlap
key.summary: Make sure no windows are below the locked list
key.description: Make sure no windows are below the locked list.

key.name: window-title-width
key.summary: Max length of the window title in pixels
key.description: Max length of the window title in pixels. This option is only used when thumbnails are disabled.

key.name: reorder-window-list
key.summary: Reorder the window list
key.description: When enabled the last activated window will be the first window in the window list. Othervice windows will be shown in the order the windows were opened.

key.name: select-one-window
key.summary: summary
key.description: description

key.name: select-multiple-windows
key.summary: summary
key.description: description

key.name: delay-on-select-all
key.summary: Delays the selection of multiple windows
key.description: This is a workaround to make sure that windows brought up in the right order when selected. If the window order seems random when you select multiple windows, activate this option.

key.name: select-next-use-lastest-active
key.summary: Change the order for "select next" action.
key.description: If this option is enabled, DockbarX will select the next window in activation order instead of selecting the next window in the order the window list has. This option is ignored if "Reorder window list" is enabled.

key.name: select-next-activate-immediately
key.summary: Bring up the next window without delay
key.description: If this option is selected the next window will be activated immediately. This option is ignored if "Reorder window list" is enabled.

key.name: media-buttons
key.summary: Enable media buttons
key.description: Enable media buttons.

key.name: quicklist
key.summary: Enable static unity quicklists
key.description: Enable static unity quicklists.

key.name: unity
key.summary: Enable Unity badges, progressbars and dynamic quicklists
key.description: Enable Unity emblems, progressbars and dynamic quicklists.

key.name: badge-use-custom-font
key.summary: Use a custom font for unity badges
key.description: Use a custom font for unity badges.

key.name: badge-font
key.summary: Custom font for unity badges
key.description: Custom font for unity badges.

key.name: badge-custom-bg-color
key.summary: Use custom a background color for unity badges
key.description: Use a custom background color for unity badges.

key.name: badge-bg-color
key.summary: Custom background color for unity badges
key.description: Custom background color for unity badges.

key.name: badge-bg-alpha
key.summary: Custom background opacity for unity badges
key.description: Custom background opacity for unity badges. Ranges from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opacue).

key.name: badge-custom-fg-color
key.summary: Use custom a font color for unity badges
key.description: Use a custom font color for unity badges.

key.name: badge-fg-color
key.summary: Custom font color for unity badges
key.description: Custom font color for unity badges.

key.name: badge-fg-alpha
key.summary: Custom font opacity for unity badges
key.description: Custom font opacity for unity badges. Ranges from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opacue).

key.name: progress-custom-bg-color
key.summary: Use custom a background color for unity progress bars
key.description: Use custom a background color for unity progress bars.

key.name: progress-bg-color
key.summary: Custom background color for unity progress bars
key.description: Custom font background color for unity progress bars.

key.name: progress-bg-alpha
key.summary: Custom background opacity for unity progress bars
key.description: Custom background opacity for progress bars. Ranges from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opacue).

key.name: progress-custom-fg-color
key.summary: Use custom a color for unity progress bars
key.description: Use custom a color for unity progress bars.

key.name: progress-fg-color
key.summary: Custom background color for unity progress bars
key.description: Custom font color for unity progress bars.

key.name: progress-fg-alpha
key.summary: Custom opacity for unity progress bars
key.description: Custom background opacity for unity progress bars. Ranges from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opacue).

key.summary: Opacify
key.description: Make all other windows transparent when a window item is hovered. Currently not working?

key.name: separate-ooo-apps
key.summary: Give Libre/OpenOffice applications their own button
key.description: Gives Writer, Calc etc. their own buttons instead of just using one button for LibreOffice/OpenOffice.

key.name: gkeys-select-next-group
key.summary: Use a keyboard command to switch to the next application
key.description: Use a keyboard command to switch to the next application.

key.summary: Keyboard command for switching to next application

key.summary: Skip unlaunched appliactions when selecting the next group
key.description: Skip unlaunched appliactions when selecting the next group.

key.name: use-number-shortcuts
key.summary: Select applications usning super+number shortcuts
key.description: Select applications usning super+number shortcuts. Eg. super+1 to select the next window of the first application and shift+super+1 to select the previous window of the first application.

key.name: launchers
key.summary: The list of pinned launchers
key.description: The list of pinned launchers.

key.name: theme-file
key.summary: The file name of the dock theme
key.description: The file name of the dock theme.

key.name: position
key.summary: The position of the dock
key.description: Position the dock at left, right, top or bottom.

key.name: size
key.summary: The size of the dock
key.description: The height of a horizontal dock or the width of a vertical dock. Meassured in pixels.

key.name: offset
key.summary: The offset of the dock
key.description: The offset meassured in pixels.

key.name: mode
key.summary: The mode of the dock
key.description: The dock has three modes: centered, the dock is shown in the middle of the edge. corner, the dock is shown in a corner of the display. panel, the dock takes up the whole edge.

key.name: behavior
key.summary: The behavior of the dock
key.description: Description needed

key.name: end-decorations
key.summary: Decorate the ends of the dock
key.description: Decorate the ends of the dock.

key.name: type
key.summary: The window type of dockx
key.description: The window type of dockx

key.name: popup-style-file
key.summary: The file name of the window list style
key.description: The file name of the window list style. If the name is theme default, the default window list style of the current theme will be used.
